Elsa.description: Alice is Elsa's colleague at Orange. They have a professional relationship and occasionally collaborate on projects. Alice admires Elsa's dedication and expertise.

John.description: Alice is John's acquaintance. They occasionally interact in social settings and share mutual acquaintances. John respects Alice's skills and contributions to her projects.

James.description: Alice is James's acquaintance. They occasionally interact in social settings and share mutual acquaintances. James appreciates Alice's skills and contributions to her projects.

Tom.description: Alice is Tom's colleague at Orange. They have a professional relationship and often discuss work-related matters. Tom appreciates Alice's skills and contributions to their projects.

Sara.description: Alice is Sara's sister. They share a close sisterly bond and often confide in each other. Sara values Alice's support and companionship.
